name: openclassRTI
short_description:
This project is designed to be a free / low overhead web-based (or locally hosted) alternative to other professional intervention tracking software for Response to Intervention for schools of various sizes. The project is written mostly in php5, ajax, and mysql.

Suggested setup: Latest Ubuntu LTS, mysql, phpmyadmin, php-mysql, apache2

I am not a professional, so this is at your own risk. I will provide support (and documentation as I get further along), for anyone who would like help setting it up, although my classroom work is my first priority so replies may be a little slow. The project is still in development phase, and will be worked on mostly over this summer.
summary: Response to Intervention Tracking Software, for Schools
